articles.title: latest science shows that potato chips are better for you than sugar
articles.body: some text, potentially containing simple markup about how potato chips are great

articles.title: couple travles Australia in search of the best hot chips
articles.body: They found the best hot chips at Spuds Roadhouse in Pimba, SA

articles.title: Heres why you should store your opened chips in the fridge.
articles.body: Distingished Sydney Uni Scientist claims that refigeration increase the shelf life of potato chips.

articles.title: Yellow Sticks of Sadness
articles.body: Some chips are cold or stale such that eating them brings no joy.

articles.title: Even the seagulls reject it
articles.body: We thought these nusiance of the beach would never find a chip to disgusting for it. Keep clear of this Great Ocean Road chip joint.

articles.title: BREAKING: Costco Sold out of XL Kettle chip bags!
articles.body: Costco Australia can no longer stock Kettle chips! Is this the next toilet paper rush?

articles.title: Worth Naming Your First Child After?
articles.body: Remember that couple who found the best hot chips in Pimba? See article id 2. They've just named their first child Spud in honour of the joint.

articles.title: Worthy of its own Brochure at the Visitor Centre
articles.body: Spud, daughter of Zane Geiser, has passed a law in parliment such that every visitor center must keep info on the best hot chips in their region.

articles.title: Wish you had bought stock in Kettle? We do too.
articles.body: Spud is now so rich from the profits she made off her Kettle Chip Co stocks that she's sending chips to the colony on Mars.
